monster.name: Balor
monster.resist: cold; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Death Throes
trait.text: When the balor dies, it explodes, and each creature within 30 feet of it must make a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking 70 (20d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The explosion ignites flammable objects in that area that aren't being worn or carried, and it destroys the balor's weapons.

trait.name: Fire Aura
trait.text: At the start of each of the balor's turns, each creature within 5 feet of it takes 10 (3d6) fire damage, and flammable objects in the aura that aren't being worn or carried ignite. A creature that touches the balor or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 10 (3d6) fire damage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The balor has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
trait.text: The balor's weapon attacks are magical.

monster.name: Pit Fiend
monster.resist: cold; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

trait.name: Fear Aura
trait.text: Any creature hostile to the pit fiend that starts its turn within 20 feet of the pit fiend must make a DC 21 Wisdom saving throw, unless the pit fiend is incapacitated. On a failed save, the creature is frightened until the start of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the pit fiend's Fear Aura for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The pit fiend has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

monster.name: Arcanaloth
monster.resist: cold, fire, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Magic Resistance
trait.text: The arcanaloth has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
